name: cymulate-phishing-awareness
label: Cymulate Phishing Awareness
description: Cymulate's Phishing Awareness campaigns evaluate employees' security awareness levels by simulating phishing attacks.

fields.name: url
fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Specify the Cymulate server URL to connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.name: key
fields.title: Secret Key
fields.tooltip: Specify the Secret Key of the API Application already created in the Cymulate Server.
fields.description: Specify the Secret Key of the API Application already created in the Cymulate Server.

fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. 
By default, this option is set to True.

operations.title: Get Phishing Awareness Report
operations.description: Get the latest Phishing Awareness report results (overview) by the environment ID from Cymulate.

parameters.name: env
parameters.title: Environment ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the environment.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the environment. If an ID is not provided, the request will return latest report results for the Default environment.

operations.title: Get Phishing Awareness assessment IDs
operations.description: Retrieve list of Phishing Awareness assessment IDs from Cymulate.

parameters.name: env
parameters.title: Environment ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the environment.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the environment. If an ID is not provided, the request will return latest report results for the Default environment.

operations.title: Get Phishing Awareness Report for Specific Assessment
operations.description: Retrieve Phishing Awareness report results for a specific assessment from Cymulate.

parameters.name: id
parameters.title: Assessment ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the assessment ID to fetch its phishing awareness report.
parameters.description: Specify the assessment ID to fetch its phishing awareness report.

operations.title: Get Phishing Awareness Assessment History
operations.description: Retrieve the Phishing Awareness Campaign assessment history within the date range provided. If a date range is not provided, the response will retrieve the history from the last 30 days.

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.title: From Date
parameters.tooltip: Specify the date from where to fetch phishing awareness aampaign assessments .
parameters.description: Specify the date from where to fetch phishing awareness campaign assessments .

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.title: To Date
parameters.tooltip: Specify the date until which phishing awareness campaign assessments should be fetched.
parameters.description: Specify the date until which phishing awareness campaign assessments should be fetched.

parameters.name: env
parameters.title: Environment ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the environment.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the environment. If an ID is not provided, the request will return latest report results for the Default environment.

operations.title: Get Phishing Awareness Campaign Report for Specific Assessment
operations.description: Retrieve Phishing Awareness Campaign report results for a specific assessment from Cymulate.

parameters.name: id
parameters.title: Assessment ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the assessment ID to fetch its phishing awareness campaign report.
parameters.description: Specify the assessment ID to fetch its phishing awareness campaign report.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.title: Offset
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of records to skip.
parameters.description: Specify the number of records to skip.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.title: Limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the limit of how many items to get.
parameters.description: Specify the limit of how many items to get.

operations.title: Create Phishing Awareness Contact Group
operations.description: Create Phishing Awareness contact group under Phishing Awareness > Contacts in Cymulate.

parameters.name: groupName
parameters.title: Group Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name for the new contact group.
parameters.description: Specify the name for the new contact group.

operations.title: Get Phishing Awareness Contact Groups
operations.description: Retrieve a list of Phishing Awareness contact groups and their IDs from Cymulate.

operations.title: Get Phishing Awareness Contacts
operations.description: Retrieve a list of contacts within a specific contact group by ID from Cymulate.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.title: Group ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the contact group ID to fetch its phishing awareness contacts.
parameters.description: Specify the contact group ID to fetch its phishing awareness contacts.
